## fieldctl scan

Scan schema and register metadata

```
fieldctl scan [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --db string       database DSN
      --driver string   database driver (mysql|postgres|mongo)
      --dry-run         print fields without upsert
  -h, --help            help for scan
      --schema string   database schema
```
